tiers.title: Prayer Overheads
notes: Blue dragons are weak to water spells and can easily be safespotted in <Link="Taverley_Dungeon">Taverley Dungeon</Link>.
Using the chaos altar in the wilderness will drastically speed up the process to unlock overheads, requiring less than 100 dragon bones.

tiers.title: Barbarian Assault
notes: The Fighter Torso is less important now with the addition of Moons armour in the game. Many players dislike Barbarian Assault and if you are one of them then feel free to skip this grind.

tiers.title: A Kingdom Divided
notes: Completing A Kingdom Divided unlocks the full potential of the <Link="Arceuus_spellbook">Arceuus spellbook</Link> which is often the most used spellbook for bossing due to the various DPS increases you can get from it.

tiers.title: Recipe for Disaster
notes: Completion of Recipe for Disaster is often considered the start of the mid game. Congrats on your progress thus far! Time to start gearing for bosses.

tiers.title: Hunters' Rumours
notes: Training hunter is very fast with <Link="Hunters'_Rumours">Hunters' Rumours</Link> and provides so many useful items for Ironmen. It's worth doing as early in your progression as you can.

tiers.title: King's Ransom
notes: You should have enough <Link="Blessed_bone_shards">Blessed bone shards</Link> to train prayer to 60 if you previously trained hunter via <Link="Hunters'_Rumours">Hunters' Rumours</Link>. Most Varlamore content provides a ton of shards that make prayer training really quick.

tiers.title: Black Mask
notes: The black mask provides a huge damage and accuracy boost while on a slayer task. It will almost always be your best in slot while on task and eventually be upgraded to a <Link="Slayer_helmet">Slayer Helmet</Link>.

tiers.title: Dagannoth Rex
notes: The only Dagannoth King worth killing right now is <Link="Dagannoth_Rex">Dagannoth Rex</Link>. The other kings are harder to kill and their rings are very marginal upgrades.
A dagannoth slayer task will make this easier if you have a <Link="Black_mask_(i)">Black Mask (i)</Link> but it is not required. You can also wait until after Barrows for better tank armour.

tiers.title: Barrows
notes: A lot of grinds in the game benefit from having tank armour. At a minimum you want to get tank legs since that slot is harder to acquire strength bonus for. Verac's armour is particularly useful for the extra prayer bonus.

tiers.title: Fire Cape

upgrades.title: 70+ ranged
upgrades.subtitle: To prepare for the the fight cave

notes: Jad is your first major challenge in your journey through OldSchool RuneScape. At this point in your progression you should be more than equipped to take him down. It may take a few tries but you got this, good luck!

tiers.title: Arkan Blade
notes: The crush weapon dropped by Amoxliatl is useful to get before you start grinding Moons of Peril, specifically for the <Link="Blue_Moon">Blue Moon</Link>. However, this moon is considered the easiest of the three so its not strictly needed.

tiers.title: Royal Titans
notes: Royal Titans does not provide any upgrades for your melee setup but the upgraded prayers are a huge DPS increase for your other combat styles and will make future bosses a lot easier to grind.

tiers.title: Slayer Grind
notes: A lot of upgrades from this point on are through slayer. This is a slow skill to train so see the next several tiers of progression for ideas on what to do while leveling.

tiers.title: Arclight
notes: Slayer should be trained in the Catacombs of Kourend as much as possible to collect <Link="Ancient_shard">ancient shards</Link>. Skotizo can also be killed for shards.

tiers.title: Demonic Gorillas
notes: It is usually better to craft a <Link="Necklace_of_anguish">Necklace of Anguish</Link> with your first zenyte but you will eventually need an Amulet of Torture to upgrade to <Link="Amulet_of_rancour">Amulet of Rancour</Link>.

tiers.title: Lizardman Shaman
notes: The <Link="Dragon_warhammer">Dragon Warhammer</Link> is used at a lot of bosses to drain their defence. It's a long but worthwhile grind, although many players wait until they start doing higher level PvM before grinding this weapon.

tiers.title: General Graardor
notes: NOTE: Soloing Graardor is very difficult without high gear and skill requirements which means you might not be able to do this boss right now.
The uniques are useful but not strictly required so it is recommended to skip this boss until you have a <Link="Bow_of_faerdhinen">Bow of Faerdhinen</Link> unless you are in a team.

tiers.title: K'ril Tsutsaroth
notes: It is not recommended to kill this boss right now without a <Link="Scorching_bow">Scorching Bow</Link> unless you are in a group.
The Zamorakian Hasta is a great stab weapon for Tombs of Amascut and is eventually needed to create a <Link="Dragon_hunter_lance">Dragon Hunter Lance</Link>.

tiers.title: Tombs of Amascut
notes: We are only farming a few common items right now: the <Link="Osmumten's_fang">Osmumten's Fang</Link> is a powerful weapon for general bossing, the <Link="Lightbearer">Lighbearer</Link> regens special attack energy twice as fast, and the <Link="Divine_rune_pouch">Divine Rune Pouch</Link> helps maximize inventory space.

tiers.title: Basilisk Knights
notes: Basilisk knights are very slow to kill and don't provide good xp rates so many players opt to skip them. The <Link="Serpentine_helm">Serpentine helm</Link> is very comparable and provides better utility so you can choose to stick with that.

tiers.title: Chambers of Xeric
notes: We are only doing Chambers of Xeric for the prayer scrolls to start sending Inferno attempts. The rest of the items will be farmed later, but if you happen to spoon an item, great!

tiers.title: CoX: Challenge Mode
notes: At this point in your gear progression, you should be strong enough to do Challenge Mode for a better chance at uniques. Both the Dragon Claws and Elder Maul are best in slot at many bosses across the game.

tiers.title: Theatre of Blood
notes: A lot of our best in slot weapons are 2h so we don't prioritize Avernic Defender sooner, but if you'd like you can do a little bit of Theatre of Blood earlier in your progression since it is the most common drop.

tiers.title: Nex
notes: Torva armour gives higher max hits but Oathplate is still better DPS for slash because of its accuracy bonus, thus Torva is mostly used on non-slash attack styles.

tiers.title: Nightmare
notes: The mace is best in slot for crush on 1x1 monsters but the Scythe is still better on larger monsters.
Inquisitor's armour is best in slot for crush but also fairly niche so it's not worth farming until you have most other gear.
